article_title: Officials 'Made It Seem' Like Obamacare Site Was Under Control (VIDEO)
article_text: "There were a lot of us, a lot of us reporters that were given various briefings, and I guess some of these people were whistling past the graveyard that were doing these presentations to us...they made it seem that they knew all of the potential problems that they were going to face."
